name: lazit-css
description: A tool, like a hammer, but for CSS. Based on InvertedTriangle Architecture

scripts.build: npm run build:ts && node ./build/build.cjs && npm run build:sass
scripts.build:ts: npx tsc build/build.ts && mv build/build.js build/build.cjs
scripts.build:sass: sass sass/main.scss public/main.css && npm run minify
